description: As they read a variety of mostly contemporary literature from English-speaking countries around the world, students learn strategies of critical analysis and interpretation. They also practice and develop skills in writing. This course is required of those beginning the English major. It is not recommended for general education students. Offered each semester. Prerequisite: FYW or concurrent enrollment in FYW.
name: Literary Studies
notes: This course is open only to sophomore and first-year students.
prerequisites: FYW or concurrent enrollment in FYW.
